phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Vetto of the Third Eye, a part of the organization known as
the Eye of the Midnight Sun that seeks to destroy the Clover Kingdom,
His power was so great that Asta and the others fell to him, one after another.
But Noelle diligently faced off with Vetto
in order to protect her friends!
I am Noelle Silva of the Black Bulls!
How dare you hurt my friends and comrades?!
Water Creation Magic: Sea Dragon's Roar!
It looked as though Noelle's attack had finally defeated Vetto,
but the battle was not over yet!
You managed to draw me out, human.
I am going to go get help.
You two tend to as many people as you can.
What is this horrifying mana I am sensing from the bottom of the sea?
Is it the beast from earlier?
It is a monster that is way more powerful than a beast!
I have never felt anything like it before...
Does Lord Vetto's power concern you?
You must be buzzing with confidence, to look away from me.
That is one of the people the captain mentioned.
One of the Third Eye, the strongest group in the Eye of the Midnight Sun...
He is the one who infiltrated the temple?
I am going to suck all the magic out of you.
That is not going to happen.
I am going to defeat you and find my comrades!
It is almost like one of the fairy tales Granny used to tell me.
Long ago, there were evil fiends that lived in this world.
They wanted to make this world and all of its magic their own.
The strongest among them used forbidden magic
to turn himself into a demon of incredible power
The one who stood against him later became the first Wizard King.
This man is just like one of the fiends from that story.
That last spell drained all my magic!
We have not given up yet!
Now is when I show you true despair!
Wh-What are you planning to do?
No one's ever escaped my Spatial Magic: Different Dimension Sphere.
Hurry up and let me out of here, or you will be sorry!
Ooh, well, are not you scary?
What the hell are you laughing at?
I am going to beat the shit out of you later!
It is too late to apologize now!
I am going to kill you!
You are trying to suck blood from a stone!
This sound's going to make me go crazy!
It is like you have suffered a painful bite.
Let us see how long you can keep buzzing around.
We are going to destroy you Magic Knights
so that we, the Eye of the Midnight Sun, can fulfill our great desire!
Is it just your arm that will not move?
Thanks for moving closer to me.
If you were too far away,
my threads would have been blown away by the sound waves.
I told you, did not I?
That I was going to defeat you and go to my comrades.
M-My body's bugging out on its own!
Suck up as much magic as you want!
But you will have to settle for your own.
I am going to replenish all the mana that was wasted on you.
I am surprised you can still stand, anti-magic brat.
What can you do when you are so beat up?
whispers to me that I should show you vermin what true despair looks like.
Kahono... used the last of her strength to heal me.
Let us pulverize this guy and heal both Kahono's throat and Kiato's leg.
I mean, even he managed to regrow an arm.
I am sure there is someone out there who can use magic to heal them!
That insane spell you did earlier...
It helped me get back onto my feet.
You are just as awesome as I thought you were!
Nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope!
What the hell are you talking about, Asta?!
Nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope!
What the hell are you talking about, Asta?!
Look how beat up you are!
What can you do in that state?
Especially against a monster like that?!
They are the strongest three in the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
They are more powerful than you?
He has to be bluffing when he says they are stronger than him.
He does have much stronger magic than Licht,
the leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun!
There is no way we could beat this guy, even if we ganged up on him!
Everyone else is already down for the count...
And he made this giant hole with no problem!
I am going to escape through that hole.
There is no way I can save them!
I need to at least escape, or we will all be wiped out!
What can you do in that condition?
Do not get cocky just because you got another eye!
Nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope, nope!
There is no way you can win!
You should hurry up and run!
You mentioned earlier that one of my weak points is that I will not give up.
Not giving up is my only weapon!
And I am never going to give up until I fulfill my wish!
Not giving up is a weapon?
I will show you just how useless that weapon is.
I will show you exactly what despair means!
Before I defeat you lot, I should probably take out the trash first.
must be the insane guy named Vetto the captain was talking about.
You are way more ugly than I thought you would be.
Maybe I should have just passed out drunk.
But you really are insane, little boy.
You did not give up, and that is why I am here.
Go on and pull me along with you!
I was wondering why the other Black Bulls liked you so much,
and I think I finally get it.
Because you did not give up, Noelle,
were all able to go beyond their limits.
A heart that refuses to give up is your only weapon?
Did you really think that these cobwebs
could keep a beast like me tied down?
What fun would it be if you actually stayed tied down?
Do you truly think you can defeat me just because another insect joined your because?
I will not make it in time!
So there was still another mouse hiding?
You guys are so into this.
That means I have to act like a proper senior.
What the heck am I doing?!
I am impressed you actually showed up.
No matter how many of you gather,
you will not even be able to scratch me.
Noelle, you have enough magic to protect everyone, right?
But you cannot see it, right?
Of course, I cannot see it,
but I definitely feel his ki.
If he manages to hit us head-on with any of his attacks, it will instantly be over.
It is life or death right off the bat!
If we get out of this alive, I will give you a hug.
You can cry all you want right into my bosom.
Finral's ki just blew the hell up!
And for you, ordinary magic attacks will not work on him at all.
You and your anti-magic will just have to take care of this.
Make sure you do not let go of that sword, no matter what.
Go give it all you have got.
Put your life on the line.
I swear that we will not let you die!
My long-range attacks never even touch the anti-magic sword.
The spatial magic user just sends them right back at me.
For a mere human, he is quite fast and accurate.
But I have got to do this!
I will just have to pick them off at close range!
The power of the spatial magic and your aura are gushing all over the place!
I am going to defeat you...
Just like it sounds, it is magic that is a service to everyone.
Let us give it a shot!
All we have had lately is smelly and hairy guys like Vetto
hogging up all the screen time.
We are going to work together and defeat Vetto!
Finral and I will assist you, Asta.
You should be able... no, I know you can do it!
Black Clover, Page 48: Despair vs. Hope.
Not giving up is our magic!
